body.name: Arc Floor Lamp for Living Room with Remote, 78” Black Standing Lamp with LED Bulb, Stepless Dimmable Color Temperature & Brightness Corner Lamp, Modern Over Couch Tall Reading Light for Bedroom Office
features: 💚【Dimmable Color Temperature & Brightness】: Our floor lamp offers a wide range of color temperature options, ranging from warm 3000K to cool 6500K, and is equipped with dimming functionality to create your ideal lighting effect. Whether you want to relax in the evening or need bright light for working or reading, our black floor lamps have what you need.

💚【Remote Control & Foot Switch】: Our arc floor lamp features a combination of a remote control(2* AAA batteries needed) and a foot switch, allowing you to effortlessly control the lighting. Whether you're on the couch, in bed, or at your desk, just use the remote control to switch lighting modes. This reading lamps floor standing also incorporates a foot switch. You can easily turn on or off the bedroom standing lamp by simply pressing the switch.

💚【9W LED Bulb Included & Timer】: LED bulb included in the package, dimmable, 25,000 hours, 9W 800 lumen. Compared to traditional incandescent bulbs, it significantly reduces energy consumption. This means that you can enjoy bright and long-lasting illumination for extended periods while reducing energy usage. Additionally, this standing lamp comes with a practical timer function. It can saving energy and ensuring sufficient illumination while avoiding unnecessary energy waste.

💚【Pure Aluminum Shade & Heavy-Duty Metal Base】: Our dimmable floor lamp features a lightweight and durable aluminum shade that is polished for easy cleaning and is rust and corrosion resistant. In addition, the corner lamp is equipped with a thick metal base to ensure that the rustic curved lamp can stand firmly on the floor without tipping over, providing sufficient safety, especially suitable for situations where there are children or pets at home.

💚【Modern Arch Design & Wide Application】: The unique curved arm and metal dome shade of this black standing lamp complement each other, creating a stylish and sophisticated appearance. Regardless of whether your home decor style is modern minimalist, industrial, or vintage classic, this floor reading lamps can seamlessly blend in. It is suitable for various spaces such as living rooms, bedrooms, study rooms, and offices, and adds an extra touch of charm to these areas.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Black Arc Floor Lamp with 9W LED Bulb The modern arc floor lamp features with a hanging dome shade and a metal base, it can increase a touch of upscale to various decor style.

Dimmable Color Temperatures & Brightness Our curved floor lamps provide 3000K-6500K color temperature options. These different color temperature options can create different atmospheres and feelings, suitable for different scenes and needs. In addition, the hanging floor lamp is equipped with dimming function.

Flexible Lampshade This 360° rotating lampshade makes our modern metal floor lamp can fully meet your close work and other lighting needs. Solid iron metal Base Our rustic arching pole light with a heavy-duty metal base that keeps standing without sway or swing, and makes it safer to use indoors. 9W LED Bulb Included LED bulb coming with the package, so you don't have to wait or worry about purchasing mismatched bulbs. Magnetic Remote Control The remote control of this lamp is designed and has a magnetic function, no need to find the location of remote. (2* AAA Batteries Needed)

Super Multiple Applications Previous page Next page This arc standing pole lamp has a stylish appearance and practical functions, fit with various decor styles such as modern, industrial or rustic, ideal for applying to your living room, bedroom, dining room, study room, reading room, office, etc.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: First time I care about writing a review cause this lamp is very cool. The price is low but the quality is very good and doesn t look like chep at all. Is tall and for the price i didn t expect that. Remote is working perfectly for now and the base is very solid. Definitely a great purchase

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: If you shopped arc lamps you know the price can be crazy. This is well built, great functional remote and does the job for frankly a crazy low price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Tall - Remote - Great for Many Uses.
reviews.reviewText: This is a tall lamp. I was not expecting that most people can walk under it without ducking down to miss it (under the arch portion).The assembly was mostly easy. The power cord was attached inside one of the lower tubes so you cannot pull the power cord slack out and it was a struggle to get it crammed back into the tube so you could screw one joint of 2 of the larger poles in the lower section. The Instructions were lacking a bit on how to attach the pole attachment piece into the weighted base but I was able to figure it out after a minute or so. So I deducted 1 star for the assembly rating: it needs some tweaking on the instructions and a way to pull out the excess power cord (maybe or less of it in the metal tubing and taken so the foot pedal is further away from weighted base).Once assembled it was tall. My wife was laughing at how tall it was. It nearly reached the top frame of a closet door. She was unsure it would be useable and looked like a pole holding up a UFO. But the funny thing is a few hours later, I later found her nestled under a blanket in a recliner in our bedroom reading a book under one of the warmer light settings. She had also entirely removed the existing lamp and had parked it by the door to the hall for me to take it away. She loves it but she still doesn't like how it looks.The real magic is the remote controlled light bulb. You can actually buy that A19 bulb with a remote for $10 or less and add it to just about any lamp or light fixture. But it is what makes this lamp really nice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is my first arc style lamp.This was super easy to assemble you just follow the rods and go in that order.The lamp over is inside the foam i accidently tossed this when I removed the heavy base away from the foam then it made sense why theres a giant block of foam its protecting the shade!Overall the fixutre itself is quite easy to set up the tricky part was the arc section where you need to tighten the smaller hex screws to secure those sections in place.It includes a 3 color temp dimmable bulb and the remote actually works!I would highly recommend this lamp as its easy to set up quite adjustable from the fixable lamp shade to the color temp and brightness level.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is TALL
reviews.reviewText: I've ordered a few arc lamps, and this is by far the tallest and reaches the furthest. It's relatively easy to assemble, does require a small tool that is included (usually they just screw together). The brightness is great and COMES WITH A REMOTE! Love not having to get out of bed to turn the light off at night. Has a clean and sleek look to it and will work in any size space.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: A beautiful timeless lamp, perfect for an apartment or house living room! It's design will stand the test of time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to assemble
reviews.reviewText: Great lamp. Love the remote and that you can use the button to turn on and off. Light shines bright. Easy to adjust to use as you need. We use it to give additional lighting to the pool table area.
